```{r}
# reading in clean data
d_all <- read_csv("../cielo/data/data_clean/cielo_data.csv")

```

```{r}
# selecting all of the columns that we need for our framework analysis
d_framework <- d_all %>% dplyr::select("age", "gender", "fam_influence", "fam_religiosity", "parent_beliefs", "framework_score", contains(c("pid", "frame_", "control")))

#omitting NAs
#d_framework <- na.omit(d_framework)

# dare there developmental differences in intervention framework scores? no
frame_age_model <- lm(framework_score ~ age, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_age_model)

# are there gender differences in intervention framework scores? no
frame_gender_model <- lm(framework_score ~ gender, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_gender_model)

# does family religiosity  impact intervention framework scores? yes!
frame_fam_religiosity_model <- lm(framework_score ~ fam_religiosity, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_fam_religiosity_model)

# does parent belief  impact intervention framework scores? no
frame_parent_beliefs_model <- lm(framework_score ~ parent_beliefs + fam_religiosity, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_parent_beliefs_model)

# does family influence impact intervention framework scores? yes!
frame_fam_influence_model <- lm(framework_score ~ fam_influence, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_fam_influence_model)

# are there interaction effects between age and religiosity to predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_age_relig_model <- lm(framework_score ~ age*fam_religiosity, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_age_relig_model)

# does perceived control predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_control_model <- lm(framework_score ~ control, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_control_model)

# does perceived control (2 cats) predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_control_cat_model <- lm(framework_score ~ control_cat, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_control_cat_model)

# does perceived control*fam relig predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_control_fam_model <- lm(framework_score ~ control_cat*fam_influence, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_control_fam_model)

```
```{r}
# now let's look at personal intervention
# are there developmental differences in own life intervention framework scores? no
frame_own_age_model <- lm(frame_own_life_num ~ age, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_own_age_model)

# are there gender differences in own life intervention framework scores? no

summary(frame_own_gender_model)

summary(frame_own_fam_religiosity_model)

summary(frame_own_parent_beliefs_model)

# does family influence impact intervention framework scores? yes!
frame_own_fam_influence_model <- lm(frame_own_life_num ~ fam_influence, data = d_framework)

# are there interaction effects between age and religiosity to predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_own_age_relig_model <- lm(frame_own_life_num ~ age*fam_religiosity, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_own_age_relig_model)

# does perceived control predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_own_control_model <- lm(frame_own_life_num ~ control, data = d_framework)
summary(frame_own_control_model)

# does perceived control (2 cats) predict intervention framework scores? no
frame_own_control_cat_model <- lm(frame_own_life_num ~ control_cat, data = d_framework)

# does perceived control*fam relig predict intervention framework scores? no

# does perceived control*fage predict intervention framework scores? no

# does perceived control*parentbelief predict intervention framework scores? no
```
